snippet.title: Race The Sun Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Race the Sun demands your devotion in the pursuit of high-scoring perfection as it wraps you in the sumptuous embrace of addiction. Get it here: http://flippfly.com/racethesun/

A hyper-kinetic game of speed and minimalistic style. The rules are simple: don't crash, rack up points, and keep boosting to keep your solar-powered craft in the ever-sinking rays of the sun. Race the Sun uses a mixture of hand-crafted and procedurally generated stages to provide a unique world every day, and invites users to create and share their own.

Help get Race the Sun on Steam! Vote here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=92973632
